mapper.insert: insert into public.category (id, name, description, isactive, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, picture) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isactive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{picture,jdbcType=BINARY})
mapper.update: update public.category set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isactive = #{isactive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=BINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, isactive, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, picture from public.category where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, description, isactive, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, picture from public.category
